name: Raphael
description: Once upon a time, there is a great Kingdom in the North. After some sort of times, the Kingdom fall into despair and become the cursed one. Not even a single person is able to save them from this calamity. Until one day, there are four youngsters went into a journey, fight bravely the entire obstacles they met only to reach The Jug of Elves Tears to save their people, to grant their hopes and bring back happiness.
